name: SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings / Particular Specification

TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - After setout of each pile
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As per IFC Drawings. Top of Pile should be within tolerance iof 75mm Horizontally and 25mm Vertically. Maximum Daviation from vertical at any level shall not be more than 1:75
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings / Particular Specification
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - For each Pile
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Pile shall be driven to an ultimate bearing capacity of 1000kN and a minimum embedment depth of 10.5m from top of abutment wall. Pile Installation Checksheet
